author: wadalliance
title: Scale-UP Wada's Translation FRENCH+
description: Many African entrepreneurs are not fairly exposed to Cardano and DLT as a whole because most of the initial information is given in English.
solution: Organize regular DLT educational events with French translation/concurrent French content to engage native French speakers more naturally.
experience: Wada has been operating in bilingual context using both professional translators and bilingual team members to provide content in French.
